description.value:
[Addictive] Lasts 2d5 Rounds. User makes -20 Willpower Test. If successful user gains the Daemonic Trait, on 2+ DoS they also gain the Phase Trait, on 3+ DoS they also gain the Warp Weapons Trait. If failing, they are Stunned for the drug's duration and gain 1 corruption point per round it lasts. If failing by 3+ DoF, also gain a Mutation.

Requirements

Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -10 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.

Effect: Unique

Notes: -
